main_definition: To contain as part of a whole or to add something in addition.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make someone aware of or incorporate them into an activity, event, or group.
meanings_and_examples.example: The seminar will include students from all departments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To comprise as part of a whole or to encompass within it.
meanings_and_examples.example: His duties include managing the budget and overseeing project completion.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To add something extra, typically in order to improve quality or effectiveness.
meanings_and_examples.example: The recipe includes fresh herbs for enhanced flavor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To bring something into consideration or account when making a decision.
meanings_and_examples.example: When determining the cost, include taxes and shipping fees.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make a particular item available in a collection, package, or set.
meanings_and_examples.example: The deluxe edition includes bonus tracks not found on the regular release.
